mapper.select: select * from member_information order by mi_joinDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into member_information(mi_id, mi_password, mi_name, mi_email, mi_phone, mi_wireline, mi_address, mi_addressDetail, mi_addressCode, mi_regidentRegNumber, mi_joinDate) values(#{mi_id}, #{mi_password}, #{mi_name}, #{mi_email}, #{mi_phone}, #{mi_wireline}, #{mi_address}, #{mi_addressDetail}, #{mi_addressCode}, #{mi_regidentRegNumber}, now())
